title: @Play
data:
**@Play** is a *"monthly column by John Harris which discusses the [history](/wiki/History "History"), present and future of the [Roguelike](/wiki/Roguelike "Roguelike") dungeon exploring genre."*. It is published on [Gamesetwatch.com](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/column_at_play/), with some more recent articles published on [@Play Collected](http://rodneylives.blogspot.com/). The articles so far are:

| #   | Title                                                                                                                                                   | Date               | Summary                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| --- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1.  | [An Introduction To Some Rogue-s](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/08/_play_introduction_1.php)                                                         | August 6, 2006     | An introduction to the roguelike genre.                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| 2.  | [What the hell does Q do again?](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/08/_play_what_the_hell_does_q_do_1.php)                                               | August 20, 2006    | A summary of the [keys](/wiki/Category:ASCII "Category:ASCII").                                                                                                                                                                               |
| 3.  | [Rogue and its Inspiration](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/09/_play_the_first_two_roguelikes.php)                                                     | September 3, 2006  | A view on the original roguelike game, *[Rogue](/wiki/Rogue_\(game\) "Rogue (game)")*.                                                                                                                                                        |
| 4.  | [Giant Eel Stories, Volume 1](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/09/_play_giant_eel_stories_volume_1.php)                                                 | September 18, 2006 | Interesting stories of *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")* [ascensions](/wiki/Ascension "Ascension") posted on [rec.games.roguelike.nethack](/wiki/Rec.games.roguelike.nethack "Rec.games.roguelike.nethack").                               |
| 5.  | [Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Blue & Red Rescue Team](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/10/_play_pokemon_mysterious_dunge.php)                                | October 2, 2006    | *[Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team and Red Rescue Team](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_Mystery_Dungeon:_Blue_Rescue_Team_and_Red_Rescue_Team "wikipedia:Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team and Red Rescue Team")*. |
| 6.  | [ToeJam & Earl, The Roguelike That's Not An RPG](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/10/_play_toejam_earl_the_roguelik_1.php)                              | October 15, 2006   | *[ToeJam & Earl](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ToeJam_%26_Earl "wikipedia:ToeJam & Earl")*.                                                                                                                                                    |
| 7.  | [Thou Art Early, But We'll Admit Thee](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/10/_play_thou_art_early_but_well_1.php)                                         | October 29, 2006   | The many ways to die in *NetHack*.                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| 8.  | [A View of the Field](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/11/_play_an_view_of_the_field.php)                                                               | November 13, 2006  | *NetHack*, *[Ancient Domains of Mystery](/wiki/Ancient_Domains_of_Mystery "Ancient Domains of Mystery")* (*ADOM*), and *[Linley's Dungeon Crawl](/wiki/Linley%27s_Dungeon_Crawl "Linley's Dungeon Crawl")*.                                   |
| 9.  | [Hack Hacks](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/11/_play_hack_hacks.php)                                                                                  | November 27, 2006  | *NetHack* [patches](/wiki/Patch "Patch").                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| 10. | [A Coward Dies A Thousand Deaths, My Computer, Several Billion](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/12/_play_a_coward_dies_a_thousand.php)                 | December 10, 2006  | [Rog-O-Matic](/wiki/Rog-O-Matic "Rog-O-Matic") & Borg, the automatic roguelike player bots.                                                                                                                                                   |
| 11. | [I Never Meta Rogue I Didn't Like](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2006/12/_play_i_never_meta_rogue_i_did.php)                                              | December 25, 2006  | Metagame elements, or *How the match may continue between the games.*                                                                                                                                                                         |
| 12. | [Giant Eel Stories, Volume 2](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/01/_play_giant_eel_stories_volume_2.php)                                                 | January 8, 2007    | Interesting stories of *NetHack* ascensions posted on rec.games.roguelike.nethack.                                                                                                                                                            |
| 13. | [Mapping the Infinite Cavern](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/01/_play_mapping_the_infinite_cav_1.php)                                                 | January 22, 2007   | Dungeon generation algorithms.                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 14. | [ADOM, Nethack With A Goatee](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/02/_play_adom_nethack_with_a_goat_1.php)                                                 | February 6, 2007   | *Ancient Domains of Mystery* (*ADOM*).                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 15. | [Tips For Travel In Gridland](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/02/_play_tips_for_travel_in_gridl.php)                                                   | February 19, 2007  | Moving safely in the grid of any roguelike.                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 16. | [Before Learning to Walk, One Must First Crawl](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/03/_play_before_learning_to_walk.php)                                  | March 6, 2007      | *Linley's Dungeon Crawl*.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| 17. | [I Believe It Not!](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/03/_play_i_believe_it_not_1.php)                                                                   | March 20, 2007     | The funny features of *NetHack*.                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| 18. | [Storytelling, Bah!](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/04/_play_storytelling_bah_1.php)                                                                  | April 2, 2007      | The declining state of storytelling and interactivity in gaming.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| 19. | [Doom, doom, doom, doom](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/04/_play_doom_doom_doom_doom.php)                                                             | April 16, 2007     | *[DoomRL](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DoomRL "wikipedia:DoomRL")*.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 20. | [Hack's Lost Brother](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/05/_play_hacks_lost_brother.php)                                                                 | May 8, 2007        | *HackLite*.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 21. | [Things to Do While Visiting Ancardia](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/05/_play_things_to_do_while_visit.php)                                          | May 22, 2007       | *ADOM* quests.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 22. | [Spoiled for Options](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/06/_play_spoiled_for_options.php)                                                                | June 5, 2007       | [Wishing](/wiki/Wish "Wish") and knowing what to wish for.                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| 23. | [Architecture of the Mystery Dungeon](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/06/_play_architecture_of_the_myst.php)                                           | June 27, 2007      | The *[Mysterious Dungeon](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mysterious_Dungeon "wikipedia:Mysterious Dungeon")* series.                                                                                                                            |
| 24. | [Taloon's Mystery Dungeon, In Great Detail](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/07/play_taloons_mystery_dungeon_i.php)                                     | July 9, 2007       | *[Taloon's Mystery Dungeon](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torneko_no_Daib%C5%8Dken:_Fushigi_no_Dungeon "wikipedia:Torneko no Daibōken: Fushigi no Dungeon")*.                                                                                  |
| 25. | [A Journey to Table Mountain, Part 1](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/07/play_journal_of_the_trip_to_ta.php)                                           | July 24, 2007      | *[Shiren the Wanderer](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shiren_the_Wanderer "wikipedia:Shiren the Wanderer")*.                                                                                                                                    |
| 26. | [A Journey to Table Mountain, Part 2](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/08/play_a_journey_to_table_mounta.php)                                           | August 7, 2007     | *Shiren the Wanderer*.                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 27. | [Fei's Problems](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/08/play_feis_problems.php)                                                                            | August 21, 2007    | *Shiren the Wanderer*.                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 28. | [Balancing a game that looks balanceless](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/09/column_play_balancing_a_game_t.php)                                       | September 6, 2007  | The game balance of *NetHack*.                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 29. | [7DRL: Seven Day Quest](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2007/09/column_play_7drl_seven_day_que.php)                                                         | September 24, 2007 | *[The Seven Day Quest](http://roguebasin.roguelikedevelopment.org/index.php?title=The_Seven_Day_Quest)*.                                                                                                                                      |

You Are Being Squeezed!](http://www.gamesetwatch.com/2009/07/column_play_the_python_strikes.php)                                   | July 27, 2009      | The [Python programming language](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_\(programming_language\) "wikipedia:Python (programming language)") and its use in roguelike development.                                                               |

html:
@Play

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

@Play is a "monthly column by John Harris which discusses the history, present and future of the Roguelike dungeon exploring genre.". It is published on Gamesetwatch.com, with some more recent articles published on @Play Collected. The articles so far are:

# Title Date Summary
1. An Introduction To Some Rogue-s August 6, 2006 An introduction to the roguelike genre.
2. What the hell does Q do again? August 20, 2006 A summary of the keys.
3. Rogue and its Inspiration September 3, 2006 A view on the original roguelike game, Rogue.
4. Giant Eel Stories, Volume 1 September 18, 2006 Interesting stories of NetHack ascensions posted on rec.games.roguelike.nethack.
5. Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Blue & Red Rescue Team October 2, 2006 Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team and Red Rescue Team.
6. ToeJam & Earl, The Roguelike That's Not An RPG October 15, 2006 ToeJam & Earl.
7. Thou Art Early, But We'll Admit Thee October 29, 2006 The many ways to die in NetHack.
8. A View of the Field November 13, 2006 NetHack, Ancient Domains of Mystery (ADOM), and Linley's Dungeon Crawl.
9. Hack Hacks November 27, 2006 NetHack patches.
10. A Coward Dies A Thousand Deaths, My Computer, Several Billion December 10, 2006 Rog-O-Matic & Borg, the automatic roguelike player bots.
11. I Never Meta Rogue I Didn't Like December 25, 2006 Metagame elements, or How the match may continue between the games.
12. Giant Eel Stories, Volume 2 January 8, 2007 Interesting stories of NetHack ascensions posted on rec.games.roguelike.nethack.
13. Mapping the Infinite Cavern January 22, 2007 Dungeon generation algorithms.
14. ADOM, Nethack With A Goatee February 6, 2007 Ancient Domains of Mystery (ADOM).
15. Tips For Travel In Gridland February 19, 2007 Moving safely in the grid of any roguelike.
16. Before Learning to Walk, One Must First Crawl March 6, 2007 Linley's Dungeon Crawl.
17. I Believe It Not! March 20, 2007 The funny features of NetHack.
18. Storytelling, Bah! April 2, 2007 The declining state of storytelling and interactivity in gaming.
19. Doom, doom, doom, doom April 16, 2007 DoomRL.

rawPage:
'''@Play''' is a ''"monthly column by John Harris which discusses the [[history]], present and future of the [[Roguelike]] dungeon exploring genre."''. It is published on [http://www.gamesetwatch.com/column_at_play/ Gamesetwatch.com], with some more recent articles published on [http://rodneylives.blogspot.com/ @Play Collected]. The articles so far are:
